pages.title: Temporal Accelerator
pages.text: The <item>Temporal Accelerator/$ is a machine that speeds up time in a 5x5x5 area. It can affect blocks, entities, or both. It produces <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ as a byproduct and needs a <thing>$(l:essentials:beam/time)time beam/$.$(br2)The <item>temporal accelerator/$ accepts a <thing>$(l:essentials:beam/time)time beam/$ in the back. It will speed up time in the affected area based on the

<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam power/$: x2 speed and +4TEn/cycle for power 4+, x3 speed and +8TEn/cycle for power 8+, x4 and +16TEn/cycle for power 12+, etc.$(br2)While holding a <item>$(l:essentials/wrench)wrench/$, the affected 5x5x5 area will be highlighted. Right-clicking the <item>temporal accelerator/$ will rotate it, and shift-right-clicking will change the mode between affecting only entities, only blocks, or both.$(br2)Multiple overlapping
<item>temporal accelerators/$ do not stack. The <item>temporal accelerator/$ itself can not be time-accelerated.$(br2)
